title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Idris Elba Falls Flat, and Are We Near the End of Binance?
description: Several crypto Twitter heads remarked on the shifty personnel changes over at Binance this week.

title: Animoca Game Studio to Launch BTC-Based Metaverse Token, Signaling New Era for Bitcoin
description: Animoca Brands subsidiary Darewise Entertainment has announced plans to launch the first-ever metaverse token for the Bitcoin blockchain. The studio says the new token aims to power a full ecosystem on Bitcoin for gaming, brands, and real-world experiences. Bitcoin Enters the Metaverse: Darewise and Animoca Brands to Pioneer New Token Darewise disclosed that the upcoming […]

title: Women-Driven AI Startups Thriving in Hyderabad
description: In a notable stride towards achieving greater gender diversity within the technology sector, Hyderabad is witnessing a surge of women-led AI startups. Recent statistics from the World Economic Forum indicate that on a global scale, only 22% of professionals engaged in Artificial Intelligence (AI) are women. However, Hyderabad is making significant progress towards achieving a ... Read more

title: Richard Kiyosaki dubs fiat currency ‘criminal money,’ advocates for crypto
description: Kiyosaki recently tweeted about his strong beliefs in the potential of cryptocurrencies, owing to the upcoming TOKEN2049 crypto conference set to take place from Sept. 18-19.
